Package com.github.maxopoly.angeliacore.model.inventory

Interface CraftingInventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftingTableInventory, PlayerInventory
    public interface CraftingInventory
    An inventory in which items can be crafted, so either the normal player inventory or a crafting table inventory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      ItemStack getCraftingResult()  
      short getCraftingResultID()

      Translates a slot in the crafting section of the inventory to an absolute slot in the inventory

    • Method Detail

      • getCraftingResult

        ItemStack getCraftingResult()
        Returns:
        The result slot of this crafting inventory

      • getCraftingResultID

        short getCraftingResultID()
        Returns:
        The index number of the slot in which the crafting result is

      • getCraftingSlots

        DummyInventory getCraftingSlots()
        Returns:
        The crafting slots of the inventory without the result

      • translateCraftingSlotToTotal

        short translateCraftingSlotToTotal​(int slot)
        Translates a slot in the crafting section of the inventory to an absolute slot in the inventory
        Parameters:
        slot - Relative slot in the crafting grid
        Returns:
        Absolute slot
